name: One Tiny Kaiju Raging
description:

  • quitting to main menu disables the ocean -- please refresh

Was your game made solo or in a team? 

 Solo: magicalporpoise#6083

Did you use any third party assets, if yes what assets did you use? 

Various art and sound credits linked in project: LowPoly Water - Ebru Dogan, Particle Pack - Unity Technologies, UX Flat Icons - Heathen Engineering, Sound Effects - Olivier Girardot,  Sound Effects - InspectorJ, Town Tycoon Pack - sorceressgamelab, Lowpoly-modular-street - quaternius, Battle Creatures Pack - Mantis Hatchery, Attack Chopper - geibu3d, Music by Kevin MacLeod, Action Of The Time font - Galdino Otten

Is your game a video game or a physical game? video game

Did you choose from one (or more) of the optional secondary themes? No

Does your game contain 18+ content (Nudity, Gore, Language)? Explosions, Visceral Sound Effects

Was this game made within the jam's development period? Yes
